nodes.text: The Tokmia system was a star system in the Anoat sector, located in the Greater Javin of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the planet Tokmia.

Tokmia was one of several sites the Galactic Empire suspected the Alliance to Restore the Republic might have been hiding following the Battle of Yavin. The Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Stalker, attached to Darth Vader's Death Squadron, dispatched a Viper probe droid to the system in 3 ABY in search of the hidden Rebel base.
